scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n site,studio -c blue,magenta "npm run dev:site" "npm run dev:studio"
scripts.sanity:seed:upsert: npm run sanity:seed:prepare && cd studio-test && npx sanity documents create ../sanity-seed.json --replace --dataset production
scripts.build:static: STATIC_EXPORT=true NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH=test next build && node scripts/fix-image-paths.js
